summary.span: 表示 UTF-16 程式碼單位 字元。

span.span: Represents a character as a UTF-16 code unit.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]使用結構來表示 Unicode 字元。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] uses the structure to represent a Unicode character. Unicode 標準會以唯一的 21 位元純量數字，並呼叫字碼指標，會識別每個 Unicode 字元，並定義 UTF 16 編碼形式，以指定的字碼指標編碼成一或多個 16 位元值序列的方式。The Unicode Standard identifies each Unicode character with a unique 21-bit scalar number called a code point, and defines the UTF-16 encoding form that specifies how a code point is encoded into a sequence of one or more 16-bit values. 每個 16 位元值的範圍從十六進位 0x0000 到 0xFFFF，而且會儲存在結構。Each 16-bit value ranges from hexadecimal 0x0000 through 0xFFFF and is stored in a structure. 值物件是它的 16 位元數字 （序數） 值。The value of a object is its 16-bit numeric (ordinal) value. 下列各節會討論之間的關聯性物件和字元，並討論一些常見的工作，以執行執行個體。The following sections examine the relationship between a object and a character and discuss some common tasks performed with instances. [Char 物件、 Unicode 字元和字串](#Relationship) [Char objects, Unicode characters, and strings](#Relationship) [字元和字元類別](#Categories) [Characters and character categories](#Categories) [字元和文字項目](#Elements) [Characters and text elements](#Elements) [常見的作業](#Operations) [Common operations](#Operations) [Char 值與 interopChar values and interop](#Interop) ## Char 物件、 Unicode 字元和字串Char objects, Unicode characters, and strings A物件是循序集合結構，表示文字的字串。A object is a sequential collection of structures that represents a string of text. 大部分的 Unicode 字元可以表示由單一物件的 surrogate 字組，及/或組合字元序列，由多個，但會做為基底的字元編碼的字元物件。Most Unicode characters can be represented by a single object, but a character that is encoded as a base character, surrogate pair, and/or combining character sequence is represented by multiple objects. 基於這個理由，結構物件是否不一定相當於單一的 Unicode 字元。For this reason, a structure in a object is not necessarily equivalent to a single Unicode character. 多個 16 位元程式碼單位用來表示單一 Unicode 字元，在下列情況：Multiple 16-bit code units are used to represent single Unicode characters in the following cases: - 字符，可能會包含單一字元或基底字元後面接著一或多個組合的字元。Glyphs, which may consist of a single character or of a base character followed by one or more combining characters. 比方說，表示的字元 ä物件單位是 u+25ce 0061 後面的程式碼物件，其程式碼單位為 U + 0308年。For example, the character ä is represented by a object whose code unit is U+0061 followed by a object whose code unit is U+0308. (A 單一也可以定義字元 ä具有 U + 00E4 的程式碼單位的物件。)下列範例說明字元 ä 包含兩個物件。(The character ä can also be defined by a single object that has a code unit of U+00E4.) The following example illustrates that the character ä consists of two objects. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/grapheme1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/grapheme1.vb#1)] - Unicode 基本多語文字面 (BMP) 以外的字元。Characters outside the Unicode Basic Multilingual Plane (BMP). Unicode 支援 BMP、 平面 0 表示除了十六個平面。Unicode supports sixteen planes in addition to the BMP, which represents plane 0. Unicode 字碼指標以 UTF-32，所包含之平面的 21 位元值。A Unicode code point is represented in UTF-32 by a 21-bit value that includes the plane. 例如，U + 1D160 代表音符的符號第八個字元。For example, U+1D160 represents the MUSICAL SYMBOL EIGHTH NOTE character. 因為 utf-16 編碼只有 16 位元，BMP 之外的字元的 utf-16 surrogate 字組來表示。Because UTF-16 encoding has only 16 bits, characters outside the BMP are represented by surrogate pairs in UTF-16. 下列範例說明 U + 1D160，第八個音符符號字元的 UTF-32 對等為 U + D834 U + DD60。The following example illustrates that the UTF-32 equivalent of U+1D160, the MUSICAL SYMBOL EIGHTH NOTE character, is U+D834 U+DD60. U + D834 是高 surrogate;高 surrogate 是從 U+D800 到 U + DBFF 的範圍。U+D834 is the high surrogate; high surrogates range from U+D800 through U+DBFF. U + DD60 是低 surrogate低 surrogate 是從 U+DC00 到 U + DFFF 的範圍。U+DD60 is the low surrogate; low surrogates range from U+DC00 through U+DFFF. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/surrogate1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/surrogate1.vb#2)] ## 字元和字元類別Characters and character categories 每個 Unicode 字元或無效的 surrogate 字組屬於 Unicode 類別。Each Unicode character or valid surrogate pair belongs to a Unicode category. 在.NET Framework 中，Unicode 分類由成員列舉型別，且包含值，例如， ，和，例如。In the .NET Framework, Unicode categories are represented by members of the enumeration and include values such as , , and , for example. 若要判斷字元的 Unicode 分類，請呼叫方法。To determine the Unicode category of a character, you call the method. 例如，下列範例會呼叫顯示字串中的每個字元的 Unicode 分類。For example, the following example calls the to display the Unicode category of each character in a string. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/GetUnicodeCategory3.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/GetUnicodeCategory3.vb#6)] 就內部而言，如字元 (U + 0000 到 U + 00FF)，ASCII 範圍之外方法取決於所報告的 Unicode 分類類別。Internally, for characters outside the ASCII range (U+0000 through U+00FF), the method depends on Unicode categories reported by the class. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，根據分類的 Unicode 字元[The Unicode Standard，Version 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/)。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], Unicode characters are classified based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/). 從.NET Framework 版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]要[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，它們會根據分類[The Unicode Standard，Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)。In versions of the .NET Framework from the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] to the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], they are classified based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/). ## 字元和文字項目Characters and text elements 因為單一字元可由多個物件，則不一定有意義，才能使用個別物件。Because a single character can be represented by multiple objects, it is not always meaningful to work with individual objects. 比方說，下列範例會將以 utf-16 編碼字碼單位表示 Aegean 的數字 0 到 9 的 Unicode 字碼指標。For instance, the following example converts the Unicode code points that represent the Aegean numbers zero through 9 to UTF-16 encoded code units. 因為錯誤地等同物件使用的字元，則會不正確回報產生的字串有 20 個字元。Because it erroneously equates objects with characters, it inaccurately reports that the resulting string has 20 characters. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/textelements2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/textelements2.vb#3)] 您可以執行下列動作以避免假設，物件都代表單一字元。You can do the following to avoid the assumption that a object represents a single character. - 您可以使用樣貌，而不是使用其個別字元來代表和分析語言內容的物件。You can work with a object in its entirety instead of working with its individual characters to represent and analyze linguistic content. - 您可以使用類別來使用文字項目，而不是個別物件。You can use the class to work with text elements instead of individual objects. 下列範例會使用物件來計算 Aegean 所組成的字串中的文字項目數目的數字零到九個。The following example uses the object to count the number of text elements in a string that consists of the Aegean numbers zero through nine. 由於它會將 surrogate 字組視為單一字元，因此會正確回報此字串包含 10 個字元。Because it considers a surrogate pair a single character, it correctly reports that the string contains ten characters. [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/textelements2a.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/textelements2a.vb#4)] - 如果字串包含一或多個組合字元的基底字元，您可以呼叫方法，以將子字串轉換成單一的 UTF 16 編碼的字碼單位。If a string contains a base character that has one or more combining characters, you can call the method to convert the substring to a single UTF-16 encoded code unit. 下列範例會呼叫方法，將基底字元 U + 0061 (拉丁文小寫字母 A) 及組合字元 U + 0308 (結合 DIAERESIS) 轉換到 U + 00E4 (拉丁文小型字母與 DIAERESIS)。The following example calls the method to convert the base character U+0061 (LATIN SMALL LETTER A) and combining character U+0308 (COMBINING DIAERESIS) to U+00E4 (LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH DIAERESIS). [!code-csharp[System.Char.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/cs/normalized.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Char.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.char.class/vb/normalized.vb#5)] ## 常見的作業Common operations 結構提供方法來比較物件，將目前值轉換成物件複製到另一個類型的物件，並判斷的 Unicode 分類物件：The structure provides methods to compare objects, convert the value of the current object to an object of another type, and determine the Unicode category of a object: |若要執行此工作To do this|使用這些`System.Char`方法Use these `System.Char` methods| |----------------|-------------------------------------| |比較物件Compare objects| 和 and | |將字碼指標轉換為字串Convert a code point to a string|| |轉換物件或 surrogate 字組的字碼指標的物件Convert a object or a surrogate pair of objects to a code point|單一字元： For a single character:

Surrogate 字組或字串中的字元： For a surrogate pair or a character in a string: | |取得字元的 Unicode 分類Get the Unicode category of a character|| |判斷字元是否位於特定的 Unicode 分類，例如數字、 字母、 標點符號，控制字元，並依此類推Determine whether a character is in a particular Unicode category such as digit, letter, punctuation, control character, and so on|， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，及 , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and | |轉換實值型別代表數字的物件Convert a object that represents a number to a numeric value type|| |轉換成字串中的字元物件Convert a character in a string into a object| 和 and | |轉換物件至物件Convert a object to a object|| |變更的大小寫物件Change the case of a object|、、 和 , , , and | ## Char 值與 interopChar values and interop 當 managed型別，表示為 Unicode utf-16 編碼字碼單位，會傳遞至 unmanaged 程式碼，interop 封送處理器會將預設設定為 ANSI 字元的轉換。When a managed type, which is represented as a Unicode UTF-16 encoded code unit, is passed to unmanaged code, the interop marshaler converts the character set to ANSI by default. 您可以套用屬性，以平台叫用宣告並屬性加入至控制項的字元集封送處理 COM interop 常輸入使用。You can apply the attribute to platform invoke declarations and the attribute to a COM interop declaration to control which character set a marshaled type uses. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的一些方法。The following code example demonstrates some of the methods in . [!code-cpp[System.Char [Type Level]#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char [Type Level]/CPP/charstructure.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[System.Char [Type Level]#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char [Type Level]/CS/charstructure.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.Char [Type Level]#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Char [Type Level]/VB/charstructure.vb#23)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作介面並執行稍微優於方法因為並沒有將`value`物件的參數。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 這個方法所執行的比較為基礎的編碼值，這個執行個體和`value`，不是其詞彙編篡的特性。The comparison performed by this method is based on the encoded values of this instance and `value`, not their lexicographical characteristics. 如果方法參數類型具有較少的位元 （較窄） 與執行個體類型，有些程式語言會執行隱含的擴展轉換，將參數的值轉換成具有更多的位元的值。If the method parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type, some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that transforms the value of the parameter into a value with more bits. 例如，假設此執行個體類型是，且參數類型為。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 編譯器會產生代表做為參數的值的指示物件，則會產生比較的值的方法執行個體和參數表示法。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an object, then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 一般而言，數值類型上執行隱含的擴展轉換。Typically, implicit widening conversions are performed on numeric types. 請參閱您的程式語言的文件，以判斷其編譯器是否會執行擴展轉換。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine if its compiler performs widening conversions. 如果無法使用執行個體與參數類型不相符和適當的轉換，則編譯器會產生指示參數並叫用多載，參數。If the instance and parameter types mismatch and a suitable conversion is not available, the compiler generates instructions to box the parameter and invoke the overload that takes an parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型和非泛型版本`CompareTo`數的值和參考類型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and non-generic versions of the `CompareTo` method for several value and reference types. [!code-cpp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CPP/cat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CS/cat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/VB/cat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會實作介面。The method implements the interface. `value`參數必須是`null`或執行個體，否則會擲回例外狀況。The `value` parameter must be `null` or an instance of ; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 這個方法所執行的比較為基礎的編碼值，這個執行個體和`value`，不一定是其詞彙編篡的特性。The comparison performed by this method is based on the encoded values of this instance and `value`, not necessarily their lexicographical characteristics. 任何執行個體，不論其值會被視為大於`null`。Any instance of , regardless of its value, is considered greater than `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範。The following code example demonstrates . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來轉換成 utf-16 編碼字串的 21 位元 Unicode 字碼指標，例如測試方法的字串之前和。Use this method to convert a 21-bit Unicode code point to a UTF-16 encoded string before testing the string with methods such as and . 有效的字碼指標外基本多語文平面 (BMP) 一律會產生有效的 surrogate 字組。A valid code point outside the Basic Multilingual Plane (BMP) always yields a valid surrogate pair. 不過，有效的程式碼內的時間點 BMP 可能不會產生有效的結果，根據 Unicode 標準，因為轉換中不使用任何語言的處理。However, a valid code point within the BMP might not yield a valid result according to the Unicode standard because no linguistic processing is used in the conversion. 基於這個理由，使用類別進行轉換 UTF-32 的資料大量大量 utf-16 資料。For that reason, use the class to convert bulk UTF-32 data into bulk UTF-16 data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範和方法。The following code example demonstrates the and methods. [!code-cpp[char.cvtutf32#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/char.cvtutf32/CPP/utf.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[char.cvtutf32#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/char.cvtutf32/CS/utf.cs#1)] [!code-vb[char.cvtutf32#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/char.cvtutf32/VB/utf.vb#1)]

span.span: is not a valid 21-bit Unicode code point ranging from U+0 through U+10FFFF, excluding the surrogate pair range from U+D800 through U+DFFF.

span.span: Converts the value of a UTF-16 encoded surrogate pair into a Unicode code point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法將 surrogate 字組轉換成的 21 位元 Unicode 字碼指標。Use this method to convert a surrogate pair into a 21-bit Unicode code point. 若要將 utf-16 資料轉換成 UTF-32 的資料，使用類別。To convert UTF-16 data into UTF-32 data, use the class. 16 位元程式碼單位，utf-16 編碼表示一般情況下，單一的 Unicode 字元。Ordinarily, UTF-16 encoding represents a single Unicode character as a 16-bit code unit. 不過，它也支援 surrogate 字組，可讓單一抽象字元來表示成兩個 16 位元程式碼單位。However, it also supports surrogate pairs, which allow a single abstract character to be represented as two 16-bit code units. 這兩個物件必須具有該範圍是從 U+D800 到 U + DBFF 的第一個 （高） 的 surrogate，是從 U+DC00 到 U + dfff 時為第二個 （低） 的 surrogate 字碼單位。These two objects must have code units that range from U+D800 to U+DBFF for the first (high) surrogate and from U+DC00 to U+DFFF for the second (low) surrogate. Surrogate 字組僅支援 utf-16 編碼方式。Surrogate pairs are supported only by UTF-16 encoding. 這個方法可讓要轉換成使用 UTF-32 編碼的字元表示 utf-16 surrogate 字組字元。This method allows a character represented by a UTF-16 surrogate pair to be converted to a character using UTF-32 encoding. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範和方法。The following code example demonstrates the and methods. span.span: The numeric value of if that character represents a number; otherwise, -1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `c`參數必須是數值表示法。The `c` parameter must be the representation of a numeric value. 例如，如果`c`為"5"，則傳回的值為 5。For example, if `c` is "5", the return value is 5. 不過，如果`c`是"z"，傳回的值為-1.0。However, if `c` is "z", the return value is -1.0. 具有相關聯的數字值的字元，才是下列其中之一的成員類別： `DecimalDigitNumber`， `LetterNumber`，或`OtherNumber`。A character has an associated numeric value if and only if it is a member of one of the following categories: `DecimalDigitNumber`, `LetterNumber`, or `OtherNumber`. 方法會假設`c`對應至單一語言的字元，並檢查該字元是否可以轉換成十進位數字。The method assumes that `c` corresponds to a single linguistic character and checks whether that character can be converted to a decimal digit. 不過，某些 Unicode 標準中的數字都由兩個組成 surrogate 字組的物件。However, some numbers in the Unicode standard are represented by two objects that form a surrogate pair. 比方說，編號系統 Aegean 字碼指標到 U + 10133 U + 10107 所組成。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下列範例會使用方法具現化代表 AEGEAN 的第一個的字串。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents AEGEAN NUMBER ONE. 做為範例所示，從輸出方法會傳回-1，如果將它傳遞為高 surrogate 或低 surrogate，此字元。As the output from the example shows, the method returns -1 if it is passed either a high surrogate or a low surrogate of this character. remarks.format: ## Remarks `s`參數必須是數值的字串表示。The `s` parameter must be the string representation of a numeric value. 例如，如果位置處的字元`index`在`s`為"5"，則傳回的值為 5。For example, if the character at position `index` in `s` is "5", the return value is 5. 不過，如果位置處的字元`index`在`s`是"z"，傳回的值為-1。However, if the character at position `index` in `s` is "z", the return value is -1. 在字串中的字元位置從零開始編製索引。Character positions in a string are indexed starting from zero. 具有相關聯的數字值的字元，才是下列其中之一的成員類別： `DecimalDigitNumber`， `LetterNumber`，或`OtherNumber`。A character has an associated numeric value if and only if it is a member of one of the following categories: `DecimalDigitNumber`, `LetterNumber`, or `OtherNumber`. 如果位置處的物件`index`的第一個的字元是有效的 surrogate 字組，方法會判斷是否將 surrogate 字組會形成數字。If the object at position `index` is the first character of a valid surrogate pair, the method determines whether the surrogate pair forms a numeric digit. 比方說，編號系統 Aegean 字碼指標到 U + 10133 U + 10107 所組成。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下列範例會使用方法具現化代表 Aegean 的每個數字的字串。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents each Aegean number. 做為範例所示，從輸出傳遞 Aegean 的數字的高 surrogate，方法會傳回正確的數字值。As the output from the example shows, the method returns the correct numeric value if it is passed the high surrogate of an Aegean number. 不過，如果它未通過低 surrogate，它會考量之低 surrogate 以隔離並傳回-1。However, if it is passed the low surrogate, it considers only the low surrogate in isolation and returns -1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不一定會傳回相同的值方法做為參數傳遞特定的字元時。The method does not always return the same value as the method when it is passed a particular character as a parameter. 方法設計用來反映目前的 Unicode 標準版本。The method is designed to reflect the current version of the Unicode standard. 相反地，雖然方法通常會反映目前的 Unicode 標準版本，它可能會傳回根據舊版標準的字元類別或它可能會從目前的標準順序傳回不同的類別若要保留回溯相容性。In contrast, although the method usually reflects the current version of the Unicode standard, it may return a character's category based on a previous version of the standard or it may return a category that differs from the current standard in order to preserve backward compatibility. 如此一來，我們建議您使用方法，而非。As a result, we recommend that you use the method instead of . 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，根據分類的 Unicode 字元[Unix Standard，Version 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/)。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], Unicode characters are classified based on [The Unix Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/). 從.NET Framework 版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]要[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，它們會根據分類[Unix Standard，Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)。In versions of the .NET Framework from the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] to the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], they are classified based on [The Unix Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範。The following code example demonstrates . remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化控制字元和其他非列印字元，例如通知、 below BEL、 CR、 FF、 LF 和 VTControl characters are formatting and other non-printing characters, such as ACK, BEL, CR, FF, LF, and VT. Unicode 標準會在 \U0000 \U001F，\U007F，以從和 \U0080 來控制字元的 \U009F 指派字碼指標。The Unicode standard assigns code points from \U0000 to \U001F, \U007F, and from \U0080 to \U009F to control characters. 根據 Unicode 標準中，這些值會解譯為控制字元，除非另行定義其使用由應用程式。According to the Unicode standard, these values are to be interpreted as control characters unless their use is otherwise defined by an application. 有效的控制字元屬於類別目錄。Valid control characters are members of the category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了代表單一字元，使用的 16 位元字碼指標，utf-16 編碼方式允許將代表的字元抽象使用兩個 16 位元字碼指標，這稱為 surrogate 字組。In addition to representing single characters using a 16-bit code point, UTF-16 encoding allows abstract characters to be represented using two 16-bit code points, which is known as a surrogate pair. 此配對中的第一個項目是高 surrogate。The first element in this pair is the high surrogate. 其字碼指標的範圍可以是從 U+D800 到 U + dbff 範圍內。Its code point can range from U+D800 to U+DBFF. 個別的 surrogate 字有它自己的; 不解譯它是做為 surrogate 字組的一部分時，才有意義。An individual surrogate has no interpretation of its own; it is meaningful only when used as part of a surrogate pair. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷是否為 Unicode 字母的任何類別的成員。This method determines whether a is a member of any category of Unicode letter. Unicode 的字母包括下列各項：Unicode letters include the following: - 大寫字母，例如 u+0041 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A) 透過 U + 005A (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER Z)，或 u+0400 （斯拉夫文大寫字母 IE 帶抑音符號） 到 U + 042F （斯拉夫文大寫字母不對）。Uppercase letters, such as U+0041 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A) through U+005A (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER Z), or U+0400 (CYRILLIC CAPITAL LETTER IE WITH GRAVE) through U+042F (CYRILLIC CAPITAL LETTER YA). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. - 小寫字母，例如 U + 0061 (拉丁文小寫字母 A) 透過 U + 007A (拉丁文小型的字母 Z，) 或 U + 03AC (希臘文小型字母 ALPHA 與 TONOS) 到 U + 03CE (希臘文小型字母 OMEGA 與 TONOS)。Lowercase letters, such as U+0061 (LATIN SMALL LETTER A) through U+007A (LATIN SMALL LETTER Z), or U+03AC (GREEK SMALL LETTER ALPHA WITH TONOS) through U+03CE (GREEK SMALL LETTER OMEGA WITH TONOS). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. - 標題大小寫字母，例如 U + 01 C 5 （LATIN CAPITAL LETTER D 與小型字母 Z 與勾） 或 U + 1FFC (希臘文大寫字母 OMEGA 與 PROSGEGRAMMENI)。Title case letters, such as U+01C5 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER D WITH SMALL LETTER Z WITH CARON) or U+1FFC (GREEK CAPITAL LETTER OMEGA WITH PROSGEGRAMMENI). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. - 修飾詞，例如 U + 02B0 (修飾詞字母小型 H) 到 U + 02C 1 （修飾詞字母反轉 GLOTTAL 停止），或 U + 1D2C (修飾詞字母大寫 A) 透過 U + 1D 61 （修飾詞字母小型卡）。Modifiers, such as U+02B0 (MODIFIER LETTER SMALL H) through U+02C1 (MODIFIER LETTER REVERSED GLOTTAL STOP), or U+1D2C (MODIFIER LETTER CAPITAL A) through U+1D61 (MODIFIER LETTER SMALL CHI). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. - 其他字母，例如 U + 05 D 0 (希伯來文字母 A) 到 U + 05EA (希伯來文字母 TAV)，U + 0621 透過 U + 063A (阿拉伯文字母 HAMZA) (阿拉伯文字母 GHAIN)，或 U + 4E00 (\) 到 U + 9 FC 3 (\)。Other letters, such as U+05D0 (HEBREW LETTER ALEF) through U+05EA (HEBREW LETTER TAV), U+0621 (ARABIC LETTER HAMZA) through U+063A (ARABIC LETTER GHAIN), or U+4E00 (\) through U+9FC3 (\). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category.

Unicode 的字母包括下列各項：Unicode letters include the following: - 大寫字母，例如 u+0041 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A) 透過 U + 005A (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER Z)，或 u+0400 （斯拉夫文大寫字母 IE 帶抑音符號） 到 U + 042F （斯拉夫文大寫字母不對）。Uppercase letters, such as U+0041 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A) through U+005A (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER Z), or U+0400 (CYRILLIC CAPITAL LETTER IE WITH GRAVE) through U+042F (CYRILLIC CAPITAL LETTER YA). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. - 小寫字母，例如 U + 0061 (拉丁文小寫字母 A) 透過 U + 007A (拉丁文小型的字母 Z，) 或 U + 03AC (希臘文小型字母 ALPHA 與 TONOS) 到 U + 03CE (希臘文小型字母 OMEGA 與 TONOS)。Lowercase letters, such as U+0061 (LATIN SMALL LETTER A) through U+007A (LATIN SMALL LETTER Z), or U+03AC (GREEK SMALL LETTER ALPHA WITH TONOS) through U+03CE (GREEK SMALL LETTER OMEGA WITH TONOS). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. - 標題大小寫字母，例如 U + 01 C 5 （LATIN CAPITAL LETTER D 與小型字母 Z 與勾） 或 U + 1FFC (希臘文大寫字母 OMEGA 與 PROSGEGRAMMENI)。Title case letters, such as U+01C5 (LATIN CAPITAL LETTER D WITH SMALL LETTER Z WITH CARON) or U+1FFC (GREEK CAPITAL LETTER OMEGA WITH PROSGEGRAMMENI). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. - 修飾詞，例如 U + 02B0 (修飾詞字母小型 H) 到 U + 02C 1 （修飾詞字母反轉 GLOTTAL 停止），或 U + 1D2C (修飾詞字母大寫 A) 透過 U + 1D 61 （修飾詞字母小型卡）。Modifiers, such as U+02B0 (MODIFIER LETTER SMALL H) through U+02C1 (MODIFIER LETTER REVERSED GLOTTAL STOP), or U+1D2C (MODIFIER LETTER CAPITAL A) through U+1D61 (MODIFIER LETTER SMALL CHI). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. - 其他字母，例如 U + 05 D 0 (希伯來文字母 A) 到 U + 05EA (希伯來文字母 TAV)，U + 0621 透過 U + 063A (阿拉伯文字母 HAMZA) (阿拉伯文字母 GHAIN)，或 U + 4E00 (\) 到 U + 9 FC 3 (\)。Other letters, such as U+05D0 (HEBREW LETTER ALEF) through U+05EA (HEBREW LETTER TAV), U+0621 (ARABIC LETTER HAMZA) through U+063A (ARABIC LETTER GHAIN), or U+4E00 (\) through U+9FC3 (\). 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範。The following code example demonstrates . remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了代表單一字元，使用的 16 位元字碼指標，utf-16 編碼方式允許將代表的字元抽象使用兩個 16 位元字碼指標，這稱為 surrogate 字組。In addition to representing single characters using a 16-bit code point, UTF-16 encoding allows abstract characters to be represented using two 16-bit code points, which is known as a surrogate pair. 此配對中的第二個項目是低 surrogate。The second element in this pair is the low surrogate. 其字碼指標的範圍可以是從 U+DC00 到 U + dfff 範圍內。Its code point can range from U+DC00 to U+DFFF. 個別的 surrogate 字有它自己的; 不解譯它是做為 surrogate 字組的一部分時，才有意義。An individual surrogate has no interpretation of its own; it is meaningful only when used as part of a surrogate pair. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷是否的任何數值的 Unicode 分類。This method determines whether a is of any numeric Unicode category. 除了包括數字，數字會包含字元、 分數、 下標、 上標、 羅馬數字、 貨幣分子和環狀數字。In addition to including digits, numbers include characters, fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, and encircled numbers. 這個方法的相反方法，可判斷是否是基底 10 位數字。This method contrasts with the method, which determines whether a is a radix-10 digit. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法並不適合以判斷是否字串包含數字字元 （例如，藉由呼叫方法的字串中的每個字元）。The method is not intended to determine whether a string consists of numeric characters (for example, by calling the method for each character in a string). 若要判斷字串是否包含數字字元，請呼叫其中一個多載`TryParse`方法 (例如或整數或浮點數型別。To determine whether a string consists of numeric characters, call one of the overloads of the `TryParse` method (such as or of an integral or floating point type. 有效的數字是隸屬， ，或類別目錄。Valid numbers are members of the , , or category. 方法會假設`c`對應至單一語言的字元，並檢查是否該字元代表一個數字。The method assumes that `c` corresponds to a single linguistic character and checks whether that character represents a number. 不過，某些 Unicode 標準中的數字都由兩個組成 surrogate 字組的物件。However, some numbers in the Unicode standard are represented by two objects that form a surrogate pair. 比方說，編號系統 Aegean 字碼指標到 U + 10133 U + 10107 所組成。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下列範例會使用方法具現化代表 AEGEAN 的第一個的字串。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents AEGEAN NUMBER ONE. 做為範例所示，從輸出方法會傳回`false`如果它傳遞為高 surrogate 或低 surrogate，此字元。As the output from the example shows, the method returns `false` if it is passed either a high surrogate or a low surrogate of this character. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷是否的任何數值的 Unicode 分類。This method determines whether a is of any numeric Unicode category. 除了包括數字，數字會包含字元、 分數、 下標、 上標、 羅馬數字、 貨幣分子和環狀數字。In addition to including digits, numbers include characters, fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, and encircled numbers. 這個方法的相反方法，可判斷是否是基底 10 位數字。This method contrasts with the method, which determines whether a is a radix-10 digit. 在字串中的字元位置從零開始編製索引。Character positions in a string are indexed starting from zero. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法並不適合以判斷是否字串包含數字字元 （例如，藉由呼叫方法的字串中的每個字元）。The method is not intended to determine whether a string consists of numeric characters (for example, by calling the method for each character in a string). 若要判斷字串是否包含數字字元，請呼叫其中一個多載`TryParse`方法 (例如或整數或浮點數型別。To determine whether a string consists of numeric characters, call one of the overloads of the `TryParse` method (such as or of an integral or floating point type. 有效的數字是隸屬， ，或類別目錄。Valid numbers are members of the , , or category. 如果位置處的物件`index`的第一個的字元是有效的 surrogate 字組，方法會判斷是否將 surrogate 字組會形成數字。If the object at position `index` is the first character of a valid surrogate pair, the method determines whether the surrogate pair forms a numeric digit. 比方說，編號系統 Aegean 字碼指標到 U + 10133 U + 10107 所組成。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下列範例會使用方法具現化代表 AEGEAN 的第一個的字串。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents AEGEAN NUMBER ONE. 做為範例所示，從輸出方法會傳回`true`傳遞 AEGEAN 第一個高 surrogate。As the output from the example shows, the method returns `true` if it is passed the high surrogate of AEGEAN NUMBER ONE. 不過，如果它未通過低 surrogate，它會考慮在低 surrogate 的類別目錄，並傳回`false`。However, if it is passed the low surrogate, it considers only the category of the low surrogate and returns `false`. remarks.format: ## Remarks Unicode 標準會辨識三個子類別目錄分隔符號：The Unicode standard recognizes three subcategories of separators: - 空格分隔符號 (類別)，其中包括 \u0020 等字元。Space separators (the category), which includes characters such as \u0020. - 行分隔符號 (類別)，其中包括 \u2028。Line separators (the category), which includes \u2028. - 段落分隔符號 (類別)，其中包括 \u2029。Paragraph separators (the category), which includes \u2029. > [!NOTE] > Unicode 標準會將字元 \u000A (LF)、 \u000C (FF) 和 \u000D (CR) 分類為控制字元 (成員類別)，而非分隔符號字元。The Unicode standard classifies the characters \u000A (LF), \u000C (FF), and \u000D (CR) as control characters (members of the category), not as separator characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在字串中的字元位置從零開始編製索引。Character positions in a string are indexed starting from zero. Unicode 標準會辨識三個子類別目錄分隔符號：The Unicode standard recognizes three subcategories of separators: - 空格分隔符號 (類別)，其中包括 \u0020 等字元。Space separators (the category), which includes characters such as \u0020. - 行分隔符號 (類別)，其中包括 \u2028。Line separators (the category), which includes \u2028. - 段落分隔符號 (類別)，其中包括 \u2029。Paragraph separators (the category), which includes \u2029. > [!NOTE] > Unicode 標準會將字元 \u000A (LF)、 \u000C (FF) 和 \u000D (CR) 分類為控制字元 (成員類別)，而非分隔符號字元。The Unicode standard classifies the characters \u000A (LF), \u000C (FF), and \u000D (CR) as control characters (members of the category), not as separator characters. ## Examples 下列範例示範。The following example demonstrates . remarks.format: ## Remarks 代理是物件在範圍從 U+D800 到 U + DFFF 的範圍內的 utf-16 字碼單位。A surrogate is a object with a UTF-16 code unit in the range from U+D800 to U+DFFF. 在這個範圍內的程式碼單位的每個字元屬於類別目錄。Each character with a code unit in this range belongs to the category. 個別的 surrogate 字碼單位不具有自己的任何解譯，但是有意義的 surrogate 字組的一部分使用時，才。The individual surrogate code unit has no interpretation of its own, but has meaning only when used as part of a surrogate pair. 如需 surrogate 字組的詳細資訊，請參閱 < Unicode 標準 > [Unicode 首頁](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information about surrogate pairs, see the Unicode Standard at the [Unicode home page](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，單一字元被以單一的 16 位元 Unicode 字碼單位。Ordinarily, a single character is represented by a single 16-bit Unicode code unit. Utf-16 編碼也支援 surrogate 字組，可讓單一抽象字元來表示兩個 16 位元程式碼單位。UTF-16 encoding also supports surrogate pairs, which allow a single abstract character to be represented by two 16-bit code units. 第一個程式碼單位，其值的範圍可以是從 U+D800 到 U + DBFF，是高 surrogate。The first code unit, whose value can range from U+D800 to U+DBFF, is the high surrogate. 第二個程式碼單位，其值的範圍可以是從 U+DC00 到 U + dfff 時，會是低 surrogate。The second code unit, whose value can range from U+DC00 to U+DFFF, is the low surrogate. 個別的 surrogate 字碼指標有其本身的任何解譯。Individual surrogate code points have no interpretation of their own. 如需 surrogate 和 Unicode 標準的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 首頁](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123)。For more information about surrogates and the Unicode Standard, see the [Unicode home page](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的符號是中的下列類別的成員: `MathSymbol`， `CurrencySymbol`， `ModifierSymbol`，和`OtherSymbol`。Valid symbols are members of the following categories in : `MathSymbol`, `CurrencySymbol`, `ModifierSymbol`, and `OtherSymbol`. Unicode 標準中的符號是一組鬆散定義的包含下列字元：Symbols in the Unicode standard are a loosely defined set of characters that include the following: - 貨幣符號。Currency symbols. - 字母符號，其中包含一組數學英數符號，以及例如 ℅、 № 符號和™。Letterlike symbols, which include a set of mathematical alphanumeric symbols as well as symbols such as ℅, №, and ™. - 數字格式，例如上標和下標。Number forms, such as subscripts and superscripts. - 數學運算子和箭號。Mathematical operators and arrows. - 幾何的符號。Geometric symbols. - 技術的符號。Technical symbols. - 點字模式。Braille patterns. - Dingbats。Dingbats.

summary.span: 指示 Unicode 字元是否分類為泛空白字元 (White Space)。

span.span: Indicates whether a Unicode character is categorized as white space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空白字元為下列的 Unicode 字元：White space characters are the following Unicode characters: - 成員類別目錄，其中包含的字元空間 (u+0020)，不中斷空格 (U + 00A0)、 歐甘文空間標記 (u+1680)，EN 四組數字 (U + 2000)，EM 四組數字 (U + 2001)，EN 空格 (U + 2002)、 EM 空格 (U + 2003)，三個每個 EM 空間 (U + 2004)，四個每個 EM 空間 (U+ 2005)，六個每個 EM 空間 (U + 2006)，圖形空格 (U + 2007)，標點符號空格 (U + 2008)，精簡空格 (U + 2009)，大的空格 (U + 200A)、 窄的不中斷空格 (U + 202F)、 中型數學空格 (U + 205F) 和表意空格 (U + 3000)。Members of the category, which includes the characters SPACE (U+0020), NO-BREAK SPACE (U+00A0), OGHAM SPACE MARK (U+1680), EN QUAD (U+2000), EM QUAD (U+2001), EN SPACE (U+2002), EM SPACE (U+2003), THREE-PER-EM SPACE (U+2004), FOUR-PER-EM SPACE (U+2005), SIX-PER-EM SPACE (U+2006), FIGURE SPACE (U+2007), PUNCTUATION SPACE (U+2008), THIN SPACE (U+2009), HAIR SPACE (U+200A), NARROW NO-BREAK SPACE (U+202F), MEDIUM MATHEMATICAL SPACE (U+205F), and IDEOGRAPHIC SPACE (U+3000). - 成員類別目錄，其中僅包含行分隔符號字元 (U + 2028)。Members of the category, which consists solely of the LINE SEPARATOR character (U+2028). - 成員類別目錄，其中僅包含段落分隔符號字元 (U + 2029)。Members of the category, which consists solely of the PARAGRAPH SEPARATOR character (U+2029). - 字元的字元資料表 (U + 0009)，行摘要 (U + 000A)、 字行表格 (U + 000B)、 換頁 (U + 000 C)、 歸位字元 (U + 000 D)，並接著行 (U + 0085)。The characters CHARACTER TABULATION (U+0009), LINE FEED (U+000A), LINE TABULATION (U+000B), FORM FEED (U+000C), CARRIAGE RETURN (U+000D), and NEXT LINE (U+0085).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空白字元為下列的 Unicode 字元：White space characters are the following Unicode characters: - 成員類別目錄，其中包含的字元空間 (u+0020)，不中斷空格 (U + 00A0)、 歐甘文空間標記 (u+1680)，EN 四組數字 (U + 2000)，EM 四組數字 (U + 2001)，EN 空格 (U + 2002)、 EM 空格 (U + 2003)，三個每個 EM 空間 (U + 2004)，四個每個 EM 空間 (U+ 2005)，六個每個 EM 空間 (U + 2006)，圖形空格 (U + 2007)，標點符號空格 (U + 2008)，精簡空格 (U + 2009)，大的空格 (U + 200A)、 窄的不中斷空格 (U + 202F)、 中型數學空格 (U + 205F) 和表意空格 (U + 3000)。Members of the category, which includes the characters SPACE (U+0020), NO-BREAK SPACE (U+00A0), OGHAM SPACE MARK (U+1680), EN QUAD (U+2000), EM QUAD (U+2001), EN SPACE (U+2002), EM SPACE (U+2003), THREE-PER-EM SPACE (U+2004), FOUR-PER-EM SPACE (U+2005), SIX-PER-EM SPACE (U+2006), FIGURE SPACE (U+2007), PUNCTUATION SPACE (U+2008), THIN SPACE (U+2009), HAIR SPACE (U+200A), NARROW NO-BREAK SPACE (U+202F), MEDIUM MATHEMATICAL SPACE (U+205F), and IDEOGRAPHIC SPACE (U+3000). - 成員類別目錄，其中僅包含行分隔符號字元 (U + 2028)。Members of the category, which consists solely of the LINE SEPARATOR character (U+2028). - 成員類別目錄，其中僅包含段落分隔符號字元 (U + 2029)。Members of the category, which consists solely of the PARAGRAPH SEPARATOR character (U+2029). - 字元的字元資料表 (U + 0009)，行摘要 (U + 000A)、 字行表格 (U + 000B)、 換頁 (U + 000 C)、 歸位字元 (U + 000 D)，並接著行 (U + 0085)。The characters CHARACTER TABULATION (U+0009), LINE FEED (U+000A), LINE TABULATION (U+000B), FORM FEED (U+000C), CARRIAGE RETURN (U+000D), and NEXT LINE (U+0085). ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用將字串轉換成大寫。Use to convert a string to uppercase. ## Examples 下列範例會將陣列中的每個字元轉換成其對等大寫; EN-US 文化特性、 文化特性而異，和 TR-TR 文化特性。The following example converts each character in an array to its uppercase equivalent for the en-US culture, the invariant culture, and the tr-TR culture. 在此範例中，每個小寫字母的大寫對應項是一種情況除外的所有文化特性相同。In this example, the uppercase equivalent of each lowercase letter is identical for all cultures except for one case. 小寫"i"字元 (u+0069) 轉換為"I"(u+0049) 在 EN-US 和文化特性而異，但到 i""(u+0130) TR-TR 文化特性中。The lowercase "i" character (U+0069) converts to "I" (U+0049) in the en-US and invariant cultures, but to "İ" (U+0130) in the tr-TR culture.
